alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:32PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Graham County through 500 PM MST... At 432 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles southeast of San Carlos, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, half inch hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly remote areas of west central Graham County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
